title: Supports are like..

embed.description: I main ADC, so I know how important it is to have a support on botlane with you. Whenever I see my support really deserves it - he tries to help me, save my butt from being hurt every time, often s...

body:
That moment you save the living sh%# out of your adc's life and they alone get all the credit for all the kills at that moments notice.
It's like you never existed. 

SUPPORT YOUR SUPPORT!

http://www.deviantart.com/art/LOVE-your-SUPPORT-Draven-DRAAAAAAVEN-u-482105438
http://www.deviantart.com/art/LOVE-your-SUPPORT-Thresh-Lucian-425573569
http://www.deviantart.com/art/LOVE-your-SUPPORT-Taric-Ezreal-464688998
http://www.deviantart.com/art/LOVE-your-SUPPORT-Braum-Ashe-Poro-468705933
http://www.deviantart.com/art/LOVE-your-SUPPORT-Lulu-Tristana-412378377
http://www.deviantart.com/art/LOVE-your-SUPPORT-Nidalee-Caitlyn-413935292
credit goes to san-shi on deviantart.

replies.body: These are funny. If you make a Bard one, make sure to make him absent in the background somewhere.

Playing his trumpet.

If he's not doing both of these, I will downvote the thread, then reupvote it.

I love this! Especially {{champion:22}} {{champion:201}}.

Nice Work! Caitlyn + Nidalee used to be so much fun with 2x Mana Manipulator...

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=P69Bbxud,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2015-05-16T05:56:31.221+0000)
>

I dearly miss mana manipulator.
And Heart of Gold. Mundo miss his Green Shell!
shiny sparkly good looking taric (unlike his splash art or ingame model) gets ignored gg riot
When my support saves me from danger, I will risk MY life to save theirs as well. Why should they have to die just to keep us alive? Man up and save your Supports <3

Much as I love this sentiment, don't get too carried away. If I dive back in to a five-man team that's catching up to us, that's to make sure you get away. Usually by the time they're sending four or five people bot, it's because they're desperate for a kill down there, probably on you because you're the important one. If I go back in? Run. I'm doing my job and keeping you alive. Unless you're 10/0 super godly, perfect cs, I-got-my-bork-at-three-minutes-in Vayne, I don't think we're gonna be able to 2v5 even under turret.

Just run. I'm only the support. I can be 0/6 and still contribute to team. It's my job to die for you anyway.

{{champion:236}}: let me get something clear to you, you bastard. I'm only working with you because my contract forces me to not kill you long enough to win this battle. after this is over, I WILL hunt you down and I WILL kill you. you got that?

{{champion:23}}  Is really mad .

Thresh OP, starts the game with 100% Wifesteal.

That joke will never not be funny.

Once saw a post about a Soraka player.
They're all in a team fight, and the enemy team has four characters with a channel in their kit. Anyway, they clumped up and Soraka got a five man silence and stun on them, then their Jinx(ADC) got a quadrakill and everybody was like "Great job Jinx!" "Woo! Go Jinx!" "Our Jinx is God."
The Yordle one is so cute!
